title: COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 1510/93 of 18 June 1993 re-establishing the levying of customs duties on products of categories 6 and 18 (order Nos 40.0060 and 40.0180), originating in Pakistan, to which the preferential tariff arrangements set out in Council Regulation (EEC) No 3832/90 apply
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 1510/93 of 18 June 1993 re-establishing the levying of customs duties on products of categories 6 and 18 (order Nos 40.0060 and 40.0180), originating in Pakistan, to which the preferential tariff arrangements set out  in Council Regulation (EEC) No 3832/90 apply
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
As from 25 June 1993 the levying of customs duties, suspended pursuant to Regulation (EEC) No 3832/90, shall be re-established in respect of the following products, imported into the Community and originating in Pakistan:
/* Tables: see OJ */

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 June 1993.
For the Commission
Christiane SCRIVENER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 370, 31. 12. 1990, p. 39.
(2) OJ No L 396, 31. 12. 1992, p. 1.
